content: I'm still trying to figure out the best way to approach the weathering on my B-29 bomber. I started with a simple Revell F-15 Eagle kit that I picked up on a whim during a trip to the hobby store in late April, and now I'm feeling more confident in my skills, but I want to take it to the next level. Can you recommend any specific weathering techniques or products that would work well on a 1/72 scale model like this?
